Class AdventureDeck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.AdventureDeck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AdventureDeck extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a deck of AdventureCards used during the game.

The deck can be either observable or hidden to players, depending on the game phase. Provides methods to manipulate and interact with the cards (add, shuffle, draw, etc.).

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • AdventureDeck

      public AdventureDeck(boolean observable)
      Constructs an AdventureDeck with a visibility setting.
      Parameters:
      observable - true if the deck can be observed (e.g., during setup), false otherwise

  • Method Details

    • isObservable

      public boolean isObservable()
      Indicates whether this deck is observable.
      Returns:
      true if players are allowed to see the deck’s content, false otherwise

    • observe

      public ArrayList<AdventureCard> observe() throws IllegalStateException
      Returns the list of cards if the deck is observable.
      Returns:
      the list of AdventureCards in the deck
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the deck is not observable

    • addCard

      public void addCard(AdventureCard card)
      Adds a new card to the deck.
      Parameters:
      card - the AdventureCard to be added

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      Randomly shuffles the order of cards in the deck.

    • getCards

      public ArrayList<AdventureCard> getCards()
      Returns the full list of cards in the deck, used especially for showing mini-decks during the ship building phase.
      Returns:
      the list of AdventureCards currently in the deck

    • getTopCard

      public AdventureCard getTopCard()
      Retrieves and removes the top card from the deck. The card’s effect is automatically triggered via useCard().
      Returns:
      the drawn AdventureCard
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the deck is empty

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Returns the number of cards currently in the deck.
      Returns:
      the size of the deck

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks whether the deck is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the deck contains no cards, false otherwise
